section.title: How to run Castor JDO's database independend unit tests
Overview
section.para: At the time of this writing Castor JDO has 3 kinds of test suites:

listitem.para: A JUnit based test suite that is used to test various functional areas against different database engines to give developers/committers some reassurance when changing the codebase.
A Junit based test suite to evaluate impact of changes on performance.

section.para: This document provides general information about running Castor JDO's database independend unit tests.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.para: See: How to setup Castor project in eclipse

section.title: Execute tests in eclipse
section.para: To execute tests in eclipse, go and right click on cpa/src/test/java source folder and select "Run As -> JUnit Test".
